info.title: Exasol SaaS REST-API
info.description:
## Authentication

The REST API can be used with your Personal Access Token (PAT). If you don't know what a PAT is, check our documentation 
[here](https://docs.exasol.com/saas/administration/access_mngt/access_token.htm).

After you created a PAT click on Authorize and add your PAT under BearerAuth.
